mapper.select: select m.mem_nickname,r.* from tb_member m,tb_recipe r where m.mem_no = r.mem_no order by regDate desc
select r.*, m.* from tb_recipe r, tb_member m where r.mem_no = m.mem_no and recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
select r.*, m.* from tb_recipe r, tb_member m where r.mem_no = m.mem_no and r.mem_no = #{memNo} order by regDate desc limit 0,4
select r.*, m.* from tb_recipe_review r inner join tb_member m on r.mem_no = m.mem_no where recipe_no = #{recipeNo} order by recipe_review_no desc limit #{begin}, #{end}
select count(*) from tb_recipe_review v inner join tb_recipe r on v.recipe_no = r.recipe_no where r.recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
mapper.update: update tb_recipe set rating = (select avg(score) from tb_recipe_review where recipe_no = #{recipeNo}) where recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
mapper.select: select r.*, m.* from tb_recipe_review r inner join tb_member m on r.mem_no = m.mem_no where recipe_review_no = #{recipeReviewNo}
select *, count(*) as cnt from tb_recipe_keyword group by #{string} order by cnt desc limit 1

select rk.recipe_no 'recipeNo', (select keyword from tb_keyword where keyword_no = rk.country) 'country', (select keyword from tb_keyword where keyword_no = rk.situation) 'situation', rk.caution 'caution', (select keyword from tb_keyword where keyword_no = rk.level) 'level', (select keyword from tb_keyword where keyword_no = rk.time) 'time', (select keyword from tb_keyword where keyword_no = rk.type) 'type' from tb_recipe_keyword rk where rk.recipe_no = #{no}

select r.*,m.*,(select keyword_no from tb_keyword where keyword_no = rk.country) 'country' from tb_recipe_keyword rk, tb_recipe r, tb_member m where rk.recipe_no = r.recipe_no and m.mem_no = r.mem_no
limit #{pageNo}, 12

select r.*,m.*,(select keyword_no from tb_keyword where keyword_no = rk.country) 'country' from tb_recipe_keyword rk, tb_recipe r, tb_member m where rk.recipe_no = r.recipe_no and m.mem_no = r.mem_no and rk.country = #{country}
limit #{pageNo}, 12
